title: Art Deco charm - LIP 053
details: LIP-053 A 3-bedroomed art deco house in very good condition and move in ready offers a living room, storage room, kitchen and bath room. Electricity and government water are connected, and the property has its own well water. There are many valuable trees on the property, such as jack, coconut, avocado and mahogany trees. The property is well positioned only 14 km away from Galle Fort, 5.6 km from Habaraduwa beach and 12 km from Unawatuna beach.
